531060.name: Far Beyond: A space odyssey Demo
531060.description:
After a breakdown that immobilizes the Genesis in the middle of space, the player wakes up inside a cryogenic tank. Indeed, Jim, an on-board assistant robot, need help to repair the spaceship before the battery stops working.

Will you succeed to patch up the Genesis?



30 minutes of gameplay


It will take a little over 30 minutes to finish the plot of the prologue.

A perfect introduction to the game as a tutorial


The prologue's role is to teach the player to use our game systems step by step and judge the quality of the title.

Access two rooms of the Genesis


The bay of command and the Columbus hangar will be available.

Try our interaction system


Grab, manipulate, disassemble, the interaction system is complete.

Try our crafting system


For the curious who want to understand and test our unique crafting system.
531060.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
